moves.name: Comet Punch
moves.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Double Hit
moves.description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Rage
moves.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: Chip Away
moves.description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

moves.name: Dizzy Punch
moves.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
